name: 彩色複製學
description: 說明色彩原理和複製色彩作業的關係，進而探討色彩複製的品質要件與其作業的創新歷程。
goals: 瞭解色彩複製的作業相關性
瞭解色彩複製的品質要件
瞭解色彩複製作業的改進或創新
syllabus:
16+2週 

教學目標  
使用多組色墨進行多色彩組合與填補色彩不足之落差，採用特別色墨色彩描述不同藍曬、印刷品、投影、雷射膜、礦石、天文景觀、手機、光學膜、保護貼的裝置與視覺現象。

  
教學進度與主題  
 

課程介紹—彩色複製學序論  
色彩基本理論Quiz-1（5%）加/減色法、彩色複製程序  
資料收集—視覺現象、藍曬、印刷品、投影、雷射膜、礦石、天文、手機、光學膜、保護貼  
分組討論1  
色感覺的基礎—視覺現象與色彩變遷特性  
色感覺的基礎—視覺理論/光源與樣本的多樣性  
CIE表色系統1  
x-Rite型錄討論  
Quiz-2（5 %）x-Rite型錄  
CIE表色系統2 / 期中評量複習  
期中評量  
濃度複製之基本概論  
Quiz-3（5%）半色調複製原理  
濃度複製—版調複製  
Quiz-4（5%）原稿濃度域計算  
Quiz-5（10%）六與九色印表機瓊斯圖作圖與分析  
濃度複製—灰色平衡  
次相加性理論  
圓形、六角色域圖  
期末製作—光箱、打樣、色彩標註、Photoshop 修色演練  
濃度複製—色彩修正/影像鮮銳度Quiz-6（10%）圓形、六角色域圖  
期末評量  
 

16+2 weeks

teaching objectives  
Use multiple sets of color inks for multi-color combination and fill in the gap of color deficiencies, and use special color inks to describe the installation and vision of different cyanotypes, prints, projections, laser films, minerals, astronomical landscapes, mobile phones, optical films, and protective stickers Phenomenon.

  
Teaching Progress and Topics

  
Course Introduction - Introduction to Color Reproduction  
Basic Color Theory Quiz-1 (5%) Additive/Subtractive Color Method, Color Copy Program  
Data collection - visual phenomena, cyanotypes, prints, projections, laser films, minerals, astronomy, mobile phones, optical films, protective stickers  
group discussion 1  
The basis of color perception - visual phenomenon and color change characteristics  
Fundamentals of Color Perception - Vision Theory/Variability of Light Sources and Samples  
CIE Color System 1  
x-Rite Catalog Discussion  
Quiz-2 (5%) x-Rite Catalog  
CIE Color System 2 / Midterm Assessment Review  
midterm assessment  
Basic Introduction to Concentration Replication  
Quiz-3 (5%) halftone reproduction principle  
Concentration copy - tone copy  
Quiz-4 (5%) original density domain calculation  
Quiz-5 (10%) Six and Nine-Color Printer Jones Chart Drawing and Analysis  
Density Copy - Gray Balance  
subadditivity theory  
Circular, hexagonal domain diagram  
Final Production - Lightbox, Proofing, Color Annotation, Photoshop Color Retouching Walkthrough  
Density Copy - Color Correction/Image Sharpness Quiz-6 (10%) Circle, Hexagon  
end-of-term assessment
